course_name: Veterinary Anaesthesia, Diagnostic Imaging and Emergency and Critical Care
description: Students develop their clinical reasoning and technical skills in the practice of veterinary anaesthesia/analgesia, diagnostic imaging and emergency and critical care of both small and large animals, by participating in activities within the School of Veterinary ScienceÂ¿s clinical facilities.
prerequisites: VETS4010, VETS4022, VETS4035, VETS4034, VETS4012, VETS4021
restricted: Enrolment restricted to Veterinary Science students only
